text: Finland was the stage of three mass shootings between 2008 and 2013, giving the country a rate of 0.34 mass shooting fatalities per 100,000 people. Some of the mass shootings which occurred in these years were the Kauhajoki school shooting and the Sello mall shooting. The Jokela school shooting, which occurred in 2007, caused additional fatalities. ==References==
title: Mass shootings in Finland
